title: Justin Trudeau - Wikipedia
snippet: In 2025, it was reported that Trudeau was dating American singer Katy Perry. On December 6, the two confirmed their relationship on Instagram.

title: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and his wife announce their separation : NPR
snippet: TORONTO — Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and his wife, Sophie Gregoire Trudeau, announced Wednesday that they are separating after 18 years of marriage.

title: Is Justin Trudeau dating? What PM said in Quebec year-end interviews | National Post
snippet: OTTAWA – The end of the year is always prone to some self-reflection from our political leaders, and Prime Minister Justin Trudeau has been making the rounds to a number of media outlets.
